flawed_nl_solution:
James is 37-15=<<37-15=18>>18 years old
So 8 years ago he was 18-8=<<18-8=10>>10 years old
That means Janet was 10/2=<<10/2=5>>5 years old 8 years ago
So Janet is now 5+8=<<5+8=13>>13 years old
That means Susan is 13-3=<<13-3=10>>10 years old
So in 5 years she will be 10+5=<<10+5=15>>15 years old
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 22, not 18. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
